item.title: The Composable Architecture: My 3 Year Experience
item.description: Introduction I recently finished a 3 year stint with a company that uses the Composable Architecture (TCA) from PointFree. I wanted to write about my experiences with TCA and some of the problems I see with it. I think Brandon Williams and Stephen Cellis, the creators of TCA, are absolutely brilliant, and what they have managed to pull off with the creation of TCA is amazing. However, Itâ€™s just the two of them, and nobody, or no thing, is perfect.
